holidays.title: Earth at Perihelion
holidays.description: Get your sunglasses on and bask in all our information about Earth at Perihelion!

holidays.title: Festival of Sleep Day
holidays.description: Cancel those plans and plump your pillow, we’ve got the dreamiest ideas for catching some ZZZZs.

holidays.title: Fruitcake Toss Day
holidays.description: If you’re not going to eat that fruitcake, you might as well toss it.

holidays.title: Humiliation Day
holidays.description: Let your pride go and be free to accept other people and their differences.

holidays.title: International Mind-Body Wellness Day
holidays.description: January 3 is International Mind-Body Wellness Day, an opportunity to celebrate how a healthy mind and healthy emotions means a healthy body! The mind, body…

holidays.title: JRR Tolkien Day
holidays.description: It's “The Lord of the Rings” author’s birthday and you’re encouraged to toast him in celebration!

holidays.title: Mahayana New Year
holidays.description: Celebrating one of the main branches of Buddhism.

holidays.title: Memento Mori "Remember You Die" Day
holidays.description: Memento Mori “Remember You Die” Day has finally arrived. So, what’s your next move?

holidays.title: National Chocolate Covered Cherry Day
holidays.description: The luscious confection brightens our outlook for whatever waits for us in the new year ahead.

holidays.title: National Write to Congress Day
holidays.description: Congress should represent their constituents’ best interests, so write to remind them today.

holidays.title: Perihelion Day
holidays.description: Gear up for this natural event that brings us closest to the sun.

holidays.title: Women Rock! Day
holidays.description: Prepare to headbang to oblivion in honor of the women who rocked rock and roll.

holidays.title: Katie McGrath’s Birthday
holidays.description: She is blessed with amazing beauty, as well as a sheer talent for acting.

holidays.title: Então Roberta?’s Birthday
holidays.description: She is a social media personality and a YouTube sensation with close to a million subscribers.

holidays.title: Erick Brian Colón’s Birthday
holidays.description: Discover all there is to know about this Latin-American pop singer,  dancer, footballer, and Instagram sensation.

holidays.title: Greta Thunberg’s Birthday
holidays.description: So young yet so determined to change the world and make a positive impact.

holidays.title: J.R.R. Tolkien’s Birthday
holidays.description: He had the unique ability to bring his characters to life through his crafty storytelling.

holidays.title: Katie Thurston’s Birthday
holidays.description: “You don’t [owe] anyone anything. Life is too short. Surround your universe with joy.”— Katie Thurston

holidays.title: Jisoo Kim’s Birthday
holidays.description: This K-pop idol with a massive social media following is adored by her fans.

holidays.title: Lloyd Polite’s Birthday
holidays.description: From New Orleans to the Big Apple, this family-loving man never stops pursuing his passion.

holidays.title: Mel Gibson’s Birthday
holidays.description: Gibson has been wowing the film industry with his good looks and acting skills for decades.

holidays.title: Raegan Revord’s Birthday
holidays.description: She is talented, has great potential, and has a long and successful career ahead.
